resources.string: This is a third party application which is in no way affiliated with the University of Bedfordshire.
This data is best used as a guide as it is not obtained directly from the university and may not be 100% accurate.
You can enter edit mode to hide sessions by holding a session. You can then toggle the viewing of hidden sessions from the menu.
You need to exit edit mode, by holding down on a session, before you can toggle hidden sessions.
No courses for this department and level.
Your selected course is no longer accessible. Please reselect your course from the list.
Some details for this session are missing due to an issue with the university system. Check the timetable website for full session details.
The next screen will ask you to select a course.
We\'ve updated!\n\nYou\'ll need to re-select your course.
Server error - please try again later.
You\'ll need an internet connection to initially download your timetable, after that you can access it offline.
A network connection is required to fetch course data.
Show a notification before sessions start (excludes hidden sessions).
Don\'t show a notification before sessions start.
Display full room names (eg "G101 - Campus Centre Lecture Theatre").
Refresh the timetable when launching the app on WiFi.
Don\'t refresh the timetable when launching the app on WiFi.
Refresh the timetable when launching the app on 2G/3G/4G.
Don\'t refresh the timetable when launching the app on 2G/3G/4G.
Enable reminder notifications before sessions start (excludes hidden sessions).
